document.full_text: phil spector's murder conviction was upheld on monday by a california appeals court, ensuring the famed music producer will remain behind bars for killing actress lana clarkson.
document.title: appeals court upholds phil spector murder conviction
lines_and_colors: phil spector's murder conviction was upheld on monday by a california appeals court, ensuring the famed music producer will remain behind bars for killing actress lana clarkson.
